techmeme.title: Microsoft Copilot customers say the AI assistants are no plug-and-play offering and involve feeding Copilot data; the Copilots excel at distilling information (Matt Day/Bloomberg)
The US NCSC warns US tech startups that "foreign threat actors", including China, might use private investment to exploit them and threaten national security (Financial Times)
Samsung Galaxy Z Fold6 review: very good battery life, easy multitasking, and seven years of updates, but narrow cover screen, bulky, heavy, and expensive (Allison Johnson/The Verge)
Law enforcement officials and experts: criminal groups are shying away from large ransomware-as-a-service platforms after disruption operations and an exit scam (Alexander Martin/The Record)
Google updates the Play Store on Android to add categorized "collections" to show installed app content, expands Play Pass, and adds curated comics in Japan (Chris Welch/The Verge)
